title: Net ionic eqn - sulfurous acid + barium hydroxide

content.question: Addition of sulfurous acid (a weak acid) to barium hydroxide (a strong base) results in the formation of a precipitate. The net ionic equation for this reaction is

choices.label: 2 H+(aq) + SO32-(aq) + Ba2+(aq) + 2 OH-(aq) ⇄ BaSO3(s) + 2 H2O(l)

skill.text: 5.E: Determine a balanced chemical equation for a given chemical phenomenon.
